financial.title: Tech Stocks Under Pressure
financial.content: NVIDIA (NVDA) and Tesla (TSLA) experiencing volatility amid AI sector concerns and broader market rotation. NVDA down over 4% in recent sessions. Consider position sizing for volatility.

financial.title: Bitcoin Holding Key Levels
financial.content: BTC maintaining support around $74K despite dollar weakness. Traditional correlation breakdown suggests potential consolidation phase.

financial.title: S&P 500 (VOO) Market Fragility
financial.content: Market state classified as FRAGILE with 68% confidence. Reduced position sizing recommended until clarity emerges.

openclaw.title: 🔧 Memory Management Tip
openclaw.content: Daily memory files (memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md) capture raw context. Curate important insights into MEMORY.md for long-term retention. Review weekly and distill learnings.

openclaw.title: ⚡ Use sessions_spawn for Complex Tasks
openclaw.content: For multi-step or long-running tasks, spawn sub-agents with sessions_spawn(). They run in isolation and report back. Prevents context bloat in main session.

openclaw.title: 📊 Session Status Monitoring
openclaw.content: Use /status to check model usage, costs, and session health. Helps track API consumption and optimize efficiency.

openclaw.title: 🔒 Security Reminder
openclaw.content: Sensitive data (API keys, passwords) stored in TOOLS.md or AGENTS.md. Never commit credentials to shared repositories. Use environment variables for deployment.

openclaw.title: 🆕 New Skills Available
openclaw.content: Check clawhub.com for new community skills. Recently added: weather, moltbook, bluebubbles. Skills provide specialized tooling for common tasks.

openclaw.title: 📱 Mobile Canvas Support
openclaw.content: Canvas can now render UIs for mobile testing. Use canvas.snapshot() to capture mobile screens during development.

openclaw.title: 🔄 Gateway Auto-Update
openclaw.content: Gateway can self-update via gateway.update.run(). Only use when explicitly requested. Config changes via gateway.config.patch() for safe updates.

recommendations.title: 📈 Consider TradingView Integration
recommendations.content: For SYGNL dashboard enhancement: TradingView widgets provide real-time charts. Lightweight embeddable widgets for BTC, NVDA, TSLA tracking.

recommendations.title: 🔔 Set Up Alert System
recommendations.content: Consider cron jobs for price alerts. Use cron.add() to schedule checks every 15-30 minutes during market hours. Alert on allocation drift >5%.

recommendations.title: ☁️ Deploy SYGNL API to OVH
recommendations.content: API is production-ready. Deploy to OVH Cloud VPS for 24/7 availability. Use PM2 or systemd for process management. SSL via LetsEncrypt.

recommendations.title: 📊 Portfolio Rebalancing Alerts
recommendations.content: Crypto allocation at 64.5%, approaching 70% limit. Set up automated alerts when allocation drifts >5% from target 60%.
